headline: Is Now the Right Moment to Consider Exxon After Recent Permian Basin Moves?
summary: Wondering whether Exxon Mobil is a bargain right now? You are not alone if you are curious whether this blue-chip energy giant lives up to the hype at today's price. After a 1.5% dip this week and a modest 0.5% gain over the past month, Exxon Mobil's share price has still delivered a solid 8.1% return year to date and holds a long-term 272.1% gain over five years. Behind these moves, Exxon continues to make headlines as it doubles down on low-carbon initiatives and major acquisitions in the...

headline: XOM Halts Plans for Massive Blue Hydrogen Plant Amid Weak Demand
summary: ExxonMobil halts its Baytown blue hydrogen project as weak demand and higher costs stall progress, and future plans hinge on stronger interest.

headline: Guyana’s Record-Breaking Oil Boom
summary: Guyana has rapidly transformed into South America’s third-largest oil producer through the explosive development of the Stabroek Block, driven by Exxon-led investment, record-fast project execution, and highly favorable early contract terms.

headline: Gulf Giants Redraw the Map of Post-Russian Energy Power
